Method Detail

getSpreadsheet

public static Object getSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                    Object options,
                                    String spreadsheetName)
                             throws MalformedURLException,
                                    IOException,
                                    ServiceException
gets a Spreadsheet from its name using DocsService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (_, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", exact:false)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name to create.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
exact: true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
exactspecifies whether the title query should be taken as an exact string.
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (List<com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry>, GApiStatus.SINGLE_FOUND)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

getSpreadsheet

public static Object getSpreadsheet(SpreadsheetService self,
                                    Object options,
                                    String spreadsheetName)
                             throws MalformedURLException,
                                    IOException,
                                    ServiceException
gets a Spreadsheet from its name using SpreadsheetService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (_, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", exact:false)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name to create.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
exact:true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
exactspecifies whether the title query should be taken as an exact string. This is the same as google api "title-exact" query parameter. booleantrue
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (List<SpreadsheetEntry>, GApiStatus.SINGLE_FOUND)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

                                         String key)
                                  throws MalformedURLException,
                                         IOException,
                                         ServiceException
gets a Spreadsheet from its key using SpreadsheetService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheetByKey("987SHSK88342")
def (spreadsheet) = service.getSpreadsheetByKey("987SHSK88342")
def (_, res) = service.getSpreadsheetByKey("987SHSK88342")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheetByKey("987SHSK88342")

Parameters:

key - the spreadsheet key to get.

a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)

createSpreadsheet

public static Object createSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                       Object options,
                                       String docname)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
creates a new Spreadsheet using DocsService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (_, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", force:true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docname - the spreadsheet name to create.
options - Specifies function options.
For example:
force: true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)
  • (null, GApiStatus.ALREADY_EXISTS)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

                                       Object options,
                                       String docname,
                                       String foldername)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
creates a new Spreadsheet in a folder using DocsService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (_, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", force:true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docname - the spreadsheet name to create.
foldername - the folder name in which the spreadsheet will be created.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
force:true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (null, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)
  • (null, GApiStatus.ALREADY_EXISTS)

createSpreadsheet

public static Object createSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                       Object options,
                                       String docname,
                                       File file)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
creates a new Spreadsheet using DocsService and provisions it with the content of a file which can be imported by GoogleSpreadsheeAPI (CSV, XLS, etc...). The file is externally provided and already opened. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", file1)
def (spreadsheet) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", file1)
def (_, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", file1)
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", file1, force:true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docname - the spreadsheet name to create.
file - the File externally managed.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
force:true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)
  • (null, GApiStatus.ALREADY_EXISTS)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

createSpreadsheet

public static Object createSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                       Object options,
                                       String docname,
                                       String foldername,
                                       File file)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
creates a new Spreadsheet using DocsService in a folder and provisions it with the content of a file which can be imported by GoogleSpreadsheeAPI (CSV, XLS, etc...). The file is externally provided and already opened. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1", file1)
def (spreadsheet) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1", file1)
def (_, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1", file1)
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.createSpreadsheet("test1", file1, force:true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docname - the spreadsheet name to create.
foldername - the folder name to create.
file - the File externally managed.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
force:tru Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (null, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)
  • (null, GApiStatus.ALREADY_EXISTS)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

deleteSpreadsheet

public static Object deleteSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                       Object options,
                                       String spreadsheetName)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
deletes one or several Spreadsheet(s) using DocsService. The result is a GApiResult and not a tuple.
For example:
def res = service.deleteSpreadsheet("test1")
def res = service.deleteSpreadsheet("test1", multiple: true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name to delete.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
multiple:true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
multipleAllows deleting multiple found folders or notbooleanfalse
Returns:
a GApiResult among:
  • NOT_FOUND
  • SINGLE_DELETED
  • MULTIPLE_DELETED
  • MULTIPLE_FOUND
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

deleteSpreadsheet

public static Object deleteSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                       Object options,
                                       String spreadsheetName,
                                       String folderName)
                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                       IOException,
                                       ServiceException
deletes one or several Spreadsheets(s) in a folder. The result is a GApiResult and not a tuple.
For example:
def res = service.deleteSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1")
def res = service.deleteSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1", multiple: true)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name to delete.
folderName - the folder name to look for.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
multiple:true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
multipleAllows deleting multiple found folders or notbooleanfalse
Returns:
a GApiResult among:
  • NOT_FOUND
  • SINGLE_DELETED
  • MULTIPLE_DELETED
  • MULTIPLE_FOUND
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

getSpreadsheet

public static Object getSpreadsheet(DocsService self,
                                    Object options,
                                    String spreadsheetName,
                                    String folderName)
                             throws MalformedURLException,
                                    IOException,
                                    ServiceException
gets a Spreadsheet in a folder from its name using DocsService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
Warning: the returned spreadsheet is a com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry instance and not a com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry For example:
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1")
def (spreadsheet) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1")
def (_, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1")
def (spreadsheet, res) = service.getSpreadsheet("test1", "folder1", [ "exact": false])

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name to create.
folderName - the folder name in which to create.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
[ "exact": true ] Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
exactspecifies whether the title query should be taken as an exact string.
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (List<com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry>, GApiStatus.SINGLE_FOUND)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

convertSpreadsheetFromDoc

public static SpreadsheetEntry convertSpreadsheetFromDoc(SpreadsheetService self,
                                                         DocumentListEntry spreadsheet)
                                                  throws MalformedURLException,
                                                         IOException,
                                                         ServiceException
converts GDocAPI spreadsheet com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry into GSpreadsheetAPI com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry. For example:
def spreadsheet = service.convertSpreadsheetFromDoc(docSpreadsheet)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheet - the com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry name to convert.
Returns:
com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

convertSpreadsheetToDoc

public static SpreadsheetEntry convertSpreadsheetToDoc(DocsService self,
                                                       SpreadsheetEntry spreadsheet)
                                                throws MalformedURLException,
                                                       IOException,
                                                       ServiceException
converts GSpreadsheetAPI com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry into GDocAPI spreadsheet com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry. For example:
def docSpreadsheet = service.convertSpreadsheetToDoc(spreadsheet)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheet - the com.google.gdata.data.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetEntry name to convert.
Returns:
com.google.gdata.data.docs.SpreadsheetEntry
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

waitForSpreadsheetCreation

public static Object waitForSpreadsheetCreation(DocsService self,
                                                Object options,
                                                String docName)
waits for spreadsheet creation by interrogating the DocsService periodically for this folder until it is found and sleeping between 2 tries... (not very elegant :) ) The result is a tuple [GApiStatus, number_of_milliseconds].
For example:
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1")
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", maxcount:20, delay:2000)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", maxcount:20)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", delay:2000)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docName - the document name to look for.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
maxcount: 15 delay: 2000 multiple: false Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
maxcountmaximum retry number before giving-upinteger10
delaydelay of sleep between 2 triesinteger1000
multipleverifies multiple folders have been createdbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (GApiStatus.OK, number_milliseconds_to_detect_document)
  • (GApiStatus.KO, number_milliseconds_before_giving_up)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

waitForSpreadsheetCreation

public static Object waitForSpreadsheetCreation(DocsService self,
                                                Object options,
                                                String docName,
                                                String folderName)
waits for spreadsheet creation in a folder by interrogating the DocsService periodically for this folder until it is found and sleeping between 2 tries... (not very elegant :) ) The result is a tuple [GApiStatus, number_of_milliseconds].
For example:
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", "folder1")
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", "folder1", maxcount:20, delay:2000)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", "folder1", maxcount:20)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetCreation("doc1", "folder1", delay:2000)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docName - the document name to look for.
folderName - the folder name to look for.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
maxcount: 15 delay: 2000 multiple: false Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
maxcountmaximum retry number before giving-upinteger10
delaydelay of sleep between 2 triesinteger1000
multipleverifies multiple folders have been createdbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (GApiStatus.OK, number_milliseconds_to_detect_document)
  • (GApiStatus.KO, number_milliseconds_before_giving_up)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

waitForSpreadsheetDeletion

public static Object waitForSpreadsheetDeletion(DocsService self,
                                                Object options,
                                                String docName)
waits for spreadsheet deletion by interrogating the DocsService periodically for this folder until it is found and sleeping between 2 tries... (not very elegant :) ) The result is a tuple [GApiStatus, number_of_milliseconds].

waitForSpreadsheetDeletion

public static Object waitForSpreadsheetDeletion(DocsService self,
                                                Object options,
                                                String docName,
                                                String folderName)
waits for spreadsheet deletion in a folder by interrogating the DocsService periodically for this folder until it is found and sleeping between 2 tries... (not very elegant :) ) The result is a tuple [GApiStatus, number_of_milliseconds].
For example:
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetDeletion("doc1", "folder1")
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetDeletion("doc1", "folder1", maxcount:20, delay:2000)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetDeletion("doc1", "folder1", maxcount:20)
def (res, nb_ms) = service.waitForSpreadsheetDeletion("doc1", "folder1", delay:2000)

Parameters:
self - the DocsService externally initialized and authenticated.
docName - the document name to look for.
folderName - the folder name to look for.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
maxcount: 15 delay: 2000 multiple: false Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
maxcountmaximum retry number before giving-upinteger10
delaydelay of sleep between 2 triesinteger1000
multipleverifies multiple folders have been createdbooleanfalse
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (GApiStatus.OK, number_milliseconds_to_detect_document)
  • (GApiStatus.KO, number_milliseconds_before_giving_up)
Throws:

getWorksheet

public static Object getWorksheet(SpreadsheetEntry self,
                                  Object options,
                                  String worksheetName)
                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                  IOException,
                                  ServiceException
gets one or more Worksheet(s) from a spreadsheet entry and from the worksheet name using SpreadsheetService. Take into account the result is a tuple (SpreadsheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (worksheet, res) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")
def (worksheet) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")
def (_, res) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetEntry externally initialized.
worksheetName - the worksheet name to get.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
No option recognized for the time being
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (List<WorksheetEntry>, GApiStatus.SINGLE_FOUND)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

getWorksheet

public static Object getWorksheet(SpreadsheetService self,
                                  Object options,
                                  String spreadsheetName,
                                  String worksheetName)
                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                  IOException,
                                  ServiceException
gets a Worksheet from spreadsheet name and worksheet name using SpreadsheetService. Take into account the result is a tuple (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (worksheet, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (worksheet) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (_, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (worksheet, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1", exact:false)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name containing the worksheet.
worksheetName - the worksheet name to get.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
exact: true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
exactspecifies whether the title query should be taken as an exact string.
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (List<WorksheetEntry>, GApiStatus.SINGLE_FOUND)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

addWorksheet

public static Object addWorksheet(SpreadsheetService self,
                                  Object options,
                                  String spreadsheetName,
                                  String worksheetName)
                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                  IOException,
                                  ServiceException
adds a Worksheet to a spreadsheet from spreadsheet name and worksheet name using SpreadsheetService. Take into account the result is a tuple (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (worksheet, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (worksheet) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (_, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def (worksheet, res) = service.getWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1", exact:false)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized and authenticated.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name containing the worksheet.
worksheetName - the worksheet name to get.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
force: true rows:25 cols:10 Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
rowssets the number of rows in the worksheetinteger100
colssets the number of cols in the worksheetinteger20
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (null, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)
  • (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus.ALREADY_EXISTS)
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException

addWorksheet

public static Object addWorksheet(SpreadsheetEntry self,
                                  Object options,
                                  String worksheetName)
                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                  IOException,
                                  ServiceException
adds a Worksheet to a spreadsheet from worksheet name. Take into account the result is a tuple (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus) and not a single variable.
For example:
def (worksheet, res) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")
def (worksheet) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")
def (_, res) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1")
def (worksheet, res) = spreadsheet.getWorksheet("worksheet1", exact:false)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetEntry externally initialized and authenticated.
worksheetName - the worksheet name to get.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
force: true, rows:125, cols:45 Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
forceforces or not the creation when an existing spreadsheet with the same name is foundbooleanfalse
rowssets the number of rows in the worksheetinteger100
colssets the number of cols in the worksheetinteger20
Returns:
a tuple among:
  • (null, GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND)
  • (null, GApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND)
  • (WorksheetEntry, GApiStatus.OK)

deleteWorksheet

public static Object deleteWorksheet(SpreadsheetService self,
                                     Object options,
                                     String spreadsheetName,
                                     String worksheetName)
                              throws MalformedURLException,
                                     IOException,
                                     ServiceException
deletes a Worksheet from a spreadsheet searching for spreadsheet name and worksheet name. For example:
def res = service.deleteWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1")
def res = service.deleteWorksheet("spreadsheet1", "worksheet1", multiple:true)

Parameters:
self - the SpreadsheetService externally initialized.
spreadsheetName - the spreadsheet name containing the worksheet.
worksheetName - the worksheet name to get.
options - Specifies function options as a map.
For example:
multiple":true Accepted options are :
optiondescriptiontypedefault value
multipleAllows deleting multiple found folders or notbooleanfalse
Returns:
a GApiStatus among:
  • GApiStatus.NOT_FOUND
  • ApiStatus.SINGLE_DELETED
  • ApiStatus.MULTIPLE_DELETED
  • ApiStatus.MULTIPLE_FOUND
  • ApiStatus.BAD_STATE
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
ServiceException
